title: Comments generated by Cgo interfere with godoc package synopsis
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

The package synopsis displayed by godoc for packages that use Cgo is typically:

Created by cgo - DO NOT EDIT

because Cgo inserts this comment above the package line in the two source files it
generates. This comment should be moved to below the package line (easy to do for the
one file, hard to do for the other file), or removed.

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

6g

Which operating system are you using?

linux

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

ha914f67fedd4+ tip
